parameters.name: Facedisp
parameters.description: Pointer to the face that the edge is on

title: IEdge.IEdgeInFaceSense2
description: Checks whether the edge and the loop lying on the specified face have the same direction (sense).

parameters.name: Facedisp
parameters.description: Pointer to the face that the edge is on

returns: True for same direction as the loop, false for opposite
remarks: If this edge does not belong to the face that is passed as an argument, unpredictable results can occur.
